attributes.action: let carers travel free when visiting disabled/elderly in hospitals
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: im disabled and my wife is my carer . she has to pay over £60 a week when im hospital on bus fares even though she is on my bus pass as acarer. she should travel free to visit me. et a letter from the hospital with details etc

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
